body: There shouldn't be any references to `globalContext()` from `TensorImpl`. So (not in this patch, necessarily) eventually we should just take the storage directly as an argument to the constructor.
body_html: There shouldn't be any references to globalContext() from TensorImpl. So (not in this patch, necessarily) eventually we should just take the storage directly as an argument to the constructor.
body_text: There shouldn't be any references to globalContext() from TensorImpl. So (not in this patch, necessarily) eventually we should just take the storage directly as an argument to the constructor.
